name: Blue Yeti X Microphone
image_prompt: Blue Yeti X USB microphone, blackout edition, large condenser capsule, LED meters on front, desktop stand
description: Professional USB condenser microphone with four capsule array and high-res LED metering. Features Blue VO!CE software, 48kHz sample rate, and multiple pickup patterns for any recording scenario.

reviews.review_text: Podcast quality audio right out of the box. Blue VO!CE presets are great.
My team can finally hear me clearly in standups.
Picks up some keyboard noise but still excellent.
